structured.description: Two Dropzone instances and initializes them with configuration options for uploading files. It handles file uploads by displaying a spinner and then appending images to the DOM once uploaded. The code also includes Google Analytics tracking code and a helper function for checking URL existence.

items.description: Initializes a drop zone for file uploads and toggles an about section.
Checks if a file exists, and if not, it waits for a specified time before checking again. If the file still does not exist after a few attempts, it stops waiting and shows an image from that file.

usage.description: This will execute the delayThenShowImages function with filename 'image1.jpg' and counter i set to 5.

items.name: delayThenShowImages

items.description: Checks whether a given URL exists or not by making a HEAD request to the specified URL using the XMLHttpRequest object. It returns a boolean value indicating whether the URL exists (status is not 404) or does not exist (status is 404).

params.name: url
params.description: Expected as a URL to be checked for existence.

returns.description: True if the URL exists and false otherwise.

items.name: UrlExists
